prompts: Create a playful ice-type Pokemon that loves to slide on ice and has a round body.
Generate a water-type creature that resembles a seal but has unique whiskers and playful eyes.
Imagine a cute Pokemon that enjoys swimming and has a fluffy belly and bright blue fur.
Design a friendly Pokemon that thrives in cold habitats and has a round, aquatic shape.
Show me a Pokemon with a chubby body and a love for snow, featuring large flippers and a cheerful expression.
Make a water/ice hybrid Pokemon with a sleek design and distinctive white whiskers.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a blue polar bear with a playful personality and a love for the sea.
